/usr/bin/g++-5    -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/trajectorydrawing.dir/draw_trajectory.cpp.o  -o trajectorydrawing -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so /home/richard/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/build/libSophus.so -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lwayland-egl -lwayland-client -lwayland-cursor -lxkbcommon -lEGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lpthread -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -Wl,-rpath,/home/richard/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/build:/usr/local/lib
